PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2020-10412020-12-11PCH,  ,  ,  , 
ActMuseums Act
PrecisApproval of the designation by the Minister of Canadian Heritage of CAROLINE DROMAGUET of Ottawa, Ontario, to act as Director of the Canadian Museum of History, to hold office during pleasure for a term of one year, or until she is no longer required to act as Director, whichever occurs first.
AttachmentsAttachment
